message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe you'd be interested in. I'm asking for $18000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, that's a bit more than I'm looking to spend. I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $12000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $12000 is our minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $15000 to seal the deal. It's a fair price considering the value of this product. Let me know what you think.
Alice, I understand you have a minimum price, but I'm still only comfortable with $12000.  If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to consider other options.
